pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 guang3 bo1 dian4 tai2

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Central Radio Station was founded, it broadcasted educational programs besides news.
sentences.chinese: 中央廣播電臺成立，除播放新聞外，還播放教育節目。

sentences.english: He dialled in the central station on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 他在收音機上調中央廣播電臺。
